Name: 80S escape
About the game: This is a first person shooting game,The player is a pathfinder soldier, who is free to explore the surrounding area to collect intelligence,Players can kill the enemy or avoid the enemy's attack, so as to ensure that the health value can survive for as long as possible. Control keys: Right-click targeting WASD movement The left Shift running Left mouse button attack Space leaping The left Ctrl squats Mouse control direction R Loaded Weapons G the bomb Middle mouse button switch weapons
